      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ThreadSafety.Violation ImmutableAnalysis.checkForImmutability(Optional<com.sun.source.tree.ClassTree> tree, com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<String> immutableTyParams, com.sun.tools.javac.code.Type.ClassType type, ImmutableAnalysis.ViolationReporter reporter)
      Check that an @Immutable-annotated class: does not declare or inherit any mutable fields, any immutable supertypes are instantiated with immutable type arguments as required by their containerOf spec, and any enclosing instances are immutable.
